org.apache.james.imap.encode.base

Class ImapResponseComposerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.imap.encode.base.ImapResponseComposerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImapConstants, ImapResponseComposer

    public class ImapResponseComposerImpl
extends Object
implements ImapConstants, ImapResponseComposer
    Class providing methods to send response messages from the server to the client.

        Description copied from interface: ImapResponseComposer
        Appends the given message after conversion to upper case. The message may be assumed to be ASCII encoded. Conversion of characters MUST NOT be performed according to the current locale but as per ASCII.
